title: Differential analysis of lipoprotein and glycoprotein profiles in bacterial infections and COVID-19 using proton nuclear magnetic resonance and machine learning
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Simona Iftimie, Núria Amigó, Neus Martínez-Micaelo, Ana F. López-Azcona, Cristian Martínez-Navidad, Helena Castañé, Andrea Jiménez-Franco, Josep Ribalta, Sandra Parra, Antoni Castro, Jordi Camps, Jorge Joven
